Html:
Hi,

I am new to Gmap.NET i believe the map load as tiles is there any way to find what are the tiles have been loaded in the currentviewArea and what are the tiles to be loaded?
there is a way, but why do you need it?
To loadmarkers based on each tiles with some conditions. Please let me know the option?
Actually iam planning to load markers after each tiles load have been completed and not for the whole currentviewArea.
but its loading fast anyway, so why to slow whole loading process by checking markers on each tile load which is ~50 for medium screen, 50 * few ms and your app starts lagging...

yes it is loading quickly but what happens is that i am loading markers from service for the whole currentviewArea so that number of markers is large and loading becomes slow so instead of whole map area i am planning to load markers for each tile so that number of markers is less and overall performance is improved.
so why do you need tiles at all, just put randomly in area some limited amount of markers
No actually its going to be vechile tracking hence we need to create marker at a particular lat and lng. so i thought of loading markers while loading while loading tiles itself.
